description: Parameters for defining the shape of the earth.
title: geodetic

ISO 19115-2: referenceSystemInfo > MD_CRS > projection > ellipsoidParameters > MD_EllipsoidParameters > semiMajorAxis

___semiMajorAxis.description: The radius of the equatorial axis of the ellipsoid.

ISO 19115-2: referenceSystemInfo > MD_CRS > projection > ellipsoidParameters > MD_EllipsoidParameters > denominatorOfFlatteningRatio

___denominatorOfFlatteningRatio.description: The denominator of the ratio of the difference between the equatorial and polar radii of the ellipsoid when the numerator is set to 1.

ISO 19115-2: referenceSystemInfo > MD_CRS > projection > ellipsoidParameters > MD_EllipsoidParameters > axisUnits

___axisUnits.description: The units of the semi-major axis.

___description.description: A natural language description of the meaning of the identifier value.

___namespace.description: A string which unambiguously defines the namespace for the identifier.

___identifier.description: A name that is used to identify the resource.

___authority.description: Citation for the authority issuing the identifier.

___ellipsoidIdentifier.description: The identification given to established representations of the Earth's shape.
